name: Flying Fortress BLAZING
text:
"Summon Reactor - BL" + "Spell Reactor - AZI" + "Trap Reactor - NG"
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing the above cards you control and/or from your GY. (You do not use "Polymerization".) Once per turn if your opponent summons a monster(s) or activates a Spell or Trap card,: negate those card(s) effects, then apply the following effect based on the type of card negated.
- Monster: Take control of 1 monster your opponent controls.
- Spell: Set 1 Spell Card your opponent controls or is in their GY to your Spell & Trap Zone.
- Trap:Set 1 Trap Card your opponent controls or is in their GY to your Spell & Trap zone. (Quick Effect): You can send all cards you control owned by your opponent to the GY; banish cards your opponent controls up to the amount of cards you sent, then inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each card sent. If this card is sent to the GY: Target up to 3 of your banished "Reactor" monsters; Special Summon them.
